Package org.lwjgl.egl

Class ANGLED3DShareHandleClientBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.egl.ANGLED3DShareHandleClientBuffer
  • public final class ANGLED3DShareHandleClientBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Native bindings to the ANGLE_d3d_share_handle_client_buffer extension.

    This extension allows creating EGL surfaces from handles to textures shared from the Direct3D API or from EGL_ANGLE_surface_texture_2d_share_handle.

    Requires ANGLE_surface_d3d_texture_2d_share_handle.
